channel.title: Help with makeing a new home!
channel.description:
Hey, i was wondering if anyone can help me out i wanna make a new home for my server how can i do this???
Where do i search Server or client and can you tell me what folder to look in thanks ill rep to whome ever helps me thx guys

item.title: Help with makeing a new home!
item.dc:creator: @samskswanch samskswanch
item.description:
@samskswanch wrote:

just get any server you want and just move the npcs. you can move npcs by going into autospawn. going down the list will look like this
spawn = 0 3222 3220 0 0 0 0 0 1 hans
while your in this login into your server go to the place where you want new hom and type ::mypos then it will give you cord then change the
spawn = 0 [3222] [3220] 0 0 0 0 0 1 hans change these to what te cords say in the game. when you done that save it then compile
you can find a server in server downloads if its your first server i wouldnt reccomend a blank. i tried it D:

Read full topic
item.source: Help with makeing a new home!
